doc:
Willard Waterman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willard_Waterman 0 Willard Lewis Waterman (August 29, 1914, Madison, Wisconsin – February 2, 1995, Burlingame, California) was a character actor in films, TV and on radio, remembered best for succeeding Harold Peary as the title character of The Great Gildersleeve at the height of that show's popularity. Willard_Lewis_Waterman ( August_29_,_1914 , Madison , Wisconsin – February_2_,_1995 , Burlingame , California ) was a_character_actor in films , TV and on radio , remembered best for succeeding Harold_Peary as the_title_character of The_Great_Gildersleeve at the_height of that_show 's_popularity .
